name: Alpha Test - TMORPG
description:
A Limited Apha style test of the game I am working on

This is a very limited test to see if I have messed anything up in the early stages. 

you will be able to connect to a multi-player game and walk around ( with others if they are also online) and interact with pickups.

you can wield weapons and wear armour.

you can go in and out of buildings.

please give feedback so I can see where I am going wrong

many thanks.
